title: Testing using setUp and tearDown function
You can set a setUp and tearDown function.

inline_content.Text: You can set a setUp and tearDown function.

title: A setUp function prepares your environment to tests.

inline_content.Text: A setUp function prepares your environment to tests.

title: A tearDown function does a rollback.

inline_content.Text: A tearDown function does a rollback.

title: This is a good option when you can’t modify your database and you need to create an object that simulate an object brought of database or need to init a configuration in each test.

inline_content.Text: This is a good option when you can’t modify your database and you need to create an object that simulate an object brought of database or need to init a configuration in each test.

title: Other example would be to prepare database to test and to do rollback

inline_content.Text: Other example would be to prepare database to test and to do rollback
